Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Okay lets tackle this The user wants 20 open ended questions based on the provided BPMN process The questions need to explore the rationale behind the flows improvements risks decisions stakeholder communication and performance measures

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First Ill start by understanding the process steps The BPMN starts with market research and RD then splits into securing components from different countries After securing they ship to Malaysia for assembly Then theres quality checks reworkscrap packing shipping to various markets customs distribution monitoring and adjusting orders

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Now the questions should cover each of these areas Let me brainstorm possible angles for each part For example the splitting into component securing could lead to a question about why parallel paths are used and how they coordinate The quality checks might prompt questions on failure rates or handling defects

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: I need to ensure questions are open ended and thought provoking Avoid yesno questions Maybe ask about optimal points for risk mitigation why certain countries are chosen for components how decisions are made during rework how stakeholders are involved at each stage etc

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Also considering performance measurement how are KPIs defined here How does the process handle variability in component supplies What about sustainability aspects like the environmental impact of shipping

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: I should check if I cover all the mentioned areas process flows improvements risks decisions communication performance Let me list out possible topics Hmm thats 20

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Let me structure each as a question Make sure they are open ended For example instead of What is the rationale maybe How does the parallel gateway in component securing optimize the process and what are the trade offs involved

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Also need to ensure they are all distinct and cover different aspects Let me go through each point and phrase them into questions Let me check for repetition and coverage Alright that should work
